timeline.message:
maven(deps): bump hibernate-validator from 5.4.0.Final to 6.1.5.Final

Bumps hibernate-validator from 5.4.0.Final to 6.1.5.Final.

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>

timeline.bodyText:
@ibacher shouldn't the validator so be using the hibernateVersion property?
So currently the validator is on an older version than the other hibernate deps since hibernate version is 5.4.18.Final
timeline.author: teleivo
